text: package psaverse facilitate archiving sharing data materials Psychological Science Accelerator projects standardized, transparent way. eventual goal collect number individual R packages developed PSA name collection.

title: Create PSA Project — psa_add_author
code: psa_add_author(   given = NULL,   family = NULL,   ORCID_number = NULL,   email = NULL,   role = NULL )

title: Create PSA Project — psa_add_author
text: path path directory local project psa_name name repo (e.g., PSA000-demo)

what: Add data to a PSA package — psa_data
title: Add data to a PSA package — psa_data
Add data to a PSA package — psa_data
code: psa_data(   data,   title,   desc,   vardesc = list(),   author = "PSA",   source = NULL,   write = TRUE,   filetype = "csv",   projdir = "." )

title: Add data to a PSA package — psa_data
text: data data data frame title short title data desc longer description data vardesc list containing vector column names labels (see faux::codebook details) author authors source URL source, blank, links file data-raw write whether create/overwrite package R file data set filetype type file save data R package projdir base directory project

title: Add data to a PSA package — psa_data
Add data to a PSA package — psa_data
code: if (FALSE) {   # simulate a small data set   demo <- data.frame(     id = rep(1:3, each = 4),     trial = rep(1:4, times = 3),     condition = rep(c("ctl", "exp"), 6),     rt = rnorm(12, 1000, 300)   )    # set up variable descriptions   vars <- list( description = c(     id = "Subject identifier",     trial = "Trial number",     condition = "Trial condition (ctl or exp)",     rt = "Reaction time in ms"   ))    # add to package   psa_data(data = demo,            title = "Demo Data",            desc = "Demonstrate how to add data to a PSA project",            vardesc = vars) }

what: Add R package dependencies for analysis code — psa_dependencies
title: Add R package dependencies for analysis code — psa_dependencies
text: function look .R .Rmd files R packages include package dependencies list. can tell scan specific folder - use default inst - add package directly. use add_package option, scan_folder ignored.

title: Add R package dependencies for analysis code — psa_dependencies
Add R package dependencies for analysis code — psa_dependencies
text: scan_folder folder examined .R .Rmd files find package libraries add_package Add single package directly
